message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $11,000. This is a competitive price, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on this product, I would like to propose a price of $10,000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,000. I'm willing to give you a small discount, but I think $10,250 is the lowest I can go. This is still a great deal for you, and I believe the product will bring significant value to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering the value I place on the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10,000.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to be reasonable, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'll meet you at $10,150. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to finalize the deal.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Considering the value I place on the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10,000.

Bob, I'm starting to get concerned that we're not going to reach an agreement. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to know that you're willing to meet me halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $10,200. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

Alice, thank you for your persistence. I truly appreciate your efforts to reach a fair agreement. Considering the value I place on the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final price of $10,000.
